div.head: 久積
div.div: accumulation over a long period; lasting accumulation

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: accumulation over a long period; lasting accumulation

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. Pathological Mechanism of an accumulation persisting in the body for an extended period of time which then may bring forth further disease that is difficult to cure. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 20: 冷氣久積不散，所以謂之久寒積冷也 , “When cold qi accumulates over a long period and fails to dissipate, it is called cold accumulating for long”.

② Pathological Condition of ji 積 , accumulation, lasting for an extended period of time. Ben cao yan yi 本草衍義 Substance Entry qian dan 鉛丹：治瘧及久積皆用 , “They served to cure all cases of malaria and lasting accumulation ”.
